清晰的沟通和决策工具提高了老年人的疫苗接种率弗吉尼亚大学新的大学医学院研究发现，他们的医疗保健提供者的明确认可，并在诊所就诊之前提供有关推荐疫苗的信息，促使更多的美国人接种疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/clear-communication-and-communication-and-decision-making-tools-boost-vaccination-vaccination-rates-rates-inger-nolder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/clear-communication-and-communication-and-decision-making-tools-boost-vaccination-vaccination-rates-rates-rates-inger-rates-in grod-inlder-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b99dd151-f1f7-4eb8-b1d8-b1d8-1bd004aaaaa1608 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 11:22:04 -0500 Clear Communication and Decision-Making Tools Boost Vaccination Rates in Older Adults
研究用明确的术语分解了阿尔茨海默氏症的治疗效果在过去的两年中，食品药品监督管理局批准了两种新型阿尔茨海默氏症疗法，该疗法是根据临床试验的数据，表明两种药物都放缓了疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/study-breaks-down-alzheimers-warteatment-treatment-effects-in-clear-terms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/study-breaks-down-alzheimers-warteatment-wartect-in-clear-terms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43c3bdb5-012f-4574-BCAA-D81AACEBF6AE Thu, 13 Feb 2025 11:16:50 -0500 Study breaks down Alzheimer's treatment effects in clear terms

Selkirk Pharma介绍Clinfast™，以加快临床试验的填充/完成Selkirk Pharma，Inc。是一家私人持有的美国药品制造商，专门从事可注射药物（包括疫苗和生物疗法）的填充和饰面，今天宣布推出Clinfast™，这是一家旨在帮助临床舞台生物技术和制药公司的范式转换服务临床试验用品的快速填充/完成过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/selkirk-pharma-indroduces-clinfaste284a2-to-exex- exexite-exexite-fillfillfinish-for-for-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/selkirk-pharma-indrododuces-clinfaste284a2-to-expedite-fillfillfillfillfinish-fillfinish-fill-clin--for-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6438BE59-B39C-42AC-823A-7195DE7A5ED8 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 07:12:00 -0500 Selkirk Pharma introduces ClinFAST™ to expedite fill/finish for clinical trials
